alert.note: Alert for Martin; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 01 at 8:39PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following counties, Martin and St. Lucie. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 837 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen, mostly in just the past hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Port Saint Lucie, Walton, Stuart, Jensen Beach, Palm City, White City, Saint Lucie Nuclear Power Plant, Sewall`s Point, Port Saint Lucie River Park, North River Shores, Saint Lucie West, Indian River Estates, Nettles Island, Tradition, Ocean Breeze Park, Rio, Hutchinson Island South and Waveland. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
